= Scala Metals Cheat Sheets =

- *<Shift+k>*           :: Type Definition (either doHover or show documentation in preview window)
- *<gd>*                :: Goto definition
- *<gy>*                :: Goto type definition
- *<gi>*                :: Goto implementation
- *<gr>*                :: Goto reference
- *<\ rn>*              :: Rename current word
- *<\ qf>*              :: Quick fix
